objectDesc.p: Papyrus, 24x12.5 (?), 1 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 27 (?) line(s) per column, 29-34 characters per line, written in Greek.

history.provenance: Purchased by Offord private collection at Muḩāfaz̧at al Jīzah, Miṣr.

msIdentifier.msName: unknown, Offord private collection, Muḩāfaz̧at al Jīzah, Miṣr.

sourceDesc.bibl: Bilabel, Friedrich, et al., Sammelbuch Griechischer Urkunden aus Agypten, Wiesbaden Harrassowitz: Heidelberg, Deutschland, 1955. OCLC 489859490.
